main event: Observers reported a round-shaped object primarily orange in color, accelerating to a great speed while diminishing in size before going out of view on January 13, 1967.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 5-6 minutes., The object was concluded to be an aircraft with an afterburner., The object moved in a northerly course., There was no physical evidence supporting the sighting., Contact with local missile facilities indicated no activity that could explain the sighting.
witness description: Observers included a person who runs a music store and appears to be sober and reliable.
